casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Samuel Clint BLANCHER. No. 109P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 27, 2007. John G. Barnwell, Assistant Attorney General, Rick Shaffer, District Attorney, for State of NC. Prior report: 170 N.C.App. 171 , 611 S.E.2d 445 . The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of February 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31": "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of June 2007." HUDSON, J., recused.
